description: A Hot Removal action has been started.

event.Summary: PCI hot removal on physical slot $v2

description: Name of server the trap occured
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapServerName

description: Physical Slot Number for which a Hot Plug Trap is generated.
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapPhysicalSlotNumber

description: A Hot Replace action has been started.

event.Summary: PCI hot replace on physical slot $v2

description: Name of server the trap occured
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapServerName

description: Physical Slot Number for which a Hot Plug Trap is generated.
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapPhysicalSlotNumber

description: The HotPlug action for the physical slot number held in
siePciHotPlugTrapPhysicalSlotNumber object is finished.

event.Summary: PCI hot plug action finished with result $v3; card state: $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapEndHotPlugAction PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapServerName s EXAMPLE PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapPhysicalSlotNumber i 9999 PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapResult s EXAMPLE PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapCardState s EXAMPLE

description: Name of server the trap occured
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapServerName

description: Physical Slot Number for which a Hot Plug Trap is generated.
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapPhysicalSlotNumber

description: The result of the HotPlug action:
- successfull
- unsuccessfull.
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapResult

description: State of the adapter card associated to the Hot Plug action :
- OK
- Safe to remove
- Removed
- Quiesced
- Not Ready
- Power Fault.
variables.name: PCI-HOTPLUG-MIB::siePciHotPlugTrapCardState

description: A SCSI device has been removed.
